Portfolio Site

Overview

Development Jekyll, Liquid, HTML5, CSS3, Github Pages
Team size Solo
Category Personal Project

Project description

As a base, this site uses the Strata Jekyll theme with a few tweaks in layout and styling. The goal of this project was to create a fast, static website to showcase my work in a way that is easy to update. I may also use this site as a blogging platform in the future.

Responsibilities

  • Modified styling and html layout
  • Hosted site on GitHub Pages
